findings.title: PVC - Price Volatility Concern
findings.description: The contract accumulates tokens from taxes to swap them for BNB, which can lead to significant price volatility.

findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of SafeMath library adds complexity, overhead, and increases gas consumption unnecessarily.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: State variables are not defined as immutable, which can save gas when defined.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not follow the Solidity naming conventions.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Events are missing or not properly triggered, which can cause issues with arithmetic operations.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code is present in the contract, making it difficult to understand and maintain.

findings.title: L17 - Usage of Solidity Assembly
findings.description: Assembly code is used, which can be error-prone and difficult to read.

findings.title: L19 - Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The compiler version is not locked, which can lead to unexpected behavior and vulnerabilities.
